definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: greed (?);—only in [[בַּת־הַיַּעֲנׇה]] Le 11:16, De 14:15; [[בְּנוֹת־יַעֲנׇה]] Mic 1:8 + 5 t.;—ostrich, (vid. √ [[יען]] supra); as wailing (sim. of mourning) Mic 1:8 (‖[[תַּנִּים]]); symbol. of loneliness Job 30:29 (´[[יַעֲ]] ´[[אָח הָיִיתִי לְתַנִּים וְרֵעַ לב]]); of desolation, as dwelling among ruins Is 13:21, Is 34:13 (‖[[תַּנִּים]]), Je 50:39; dwelling in desert Is 43:20 (‖[[תַּנִּים]]); unclean fowl Le 11:16, De 14:15.
